item.description:
Star Trek will be in Imax for 2 weeks only, so please join us in seeing one of the most anticipated movies of the season on the BIG screen.

We will be seeing the 7:00 pm show. Let's meet in the lobby next to the concession stand, so that we can all sit together.

I suggest everybody purchase their tickets as soon as you can, because I anticipate a large demand.

Hope to see you all at the movies.

http://www.jordansima...
item.how_to_find_us: Judie & I will be wearing our "rainbow" combs
item.name: Calling all Trekkies - The movie is coming!!!!
